data.text:
Daniel Stăncescu

Senior Associate

daniel.stancescu@nndkp.ro

+40 21 201 1200

Practice areas

Employment

Expertise

individual employment agreements – execution, amendment, suspension, termination

internal regulations and policies

individual and collective dismissals

disciplinary investigation proceedings

health and safety matters

transfer of employees procedures

transnational posting of workers

special negotiation bodies – European work councils

drafting due diligence reports

day-to-day assistance on labor issues

Representative Cases and Transactions

assistance to a leading real estate company in relation to their individual employment agreements and their internal regulations and policies

advice to a major international bank in connection with disciplinary investigation proceedings, as well as with their internal regulation and anti-harassment policies

assistance to an international ride-sharing company with drafting their new internal regulation and policies and on day-to-day employment matters

advice to a worldwide leader in video gaming on employment agreements, termination issues, teleworking arrangements, employees’ benefits and other employment specific issues

assistance to a leading global professional services company in relation to various employment matters such as health and safety, annual leave, teleworking, transfer of undertakings, or transnational posting of workers

Education

University of Bucharest Law School, Law Degree

University of Bucharest Law School, Master Degree in Business Law
